text.section: The Council may employ a staff and retain professional consultants.

The Council shall:
determine the powers and duties of the staff; and
set the compensation of the staff.

section.section: The Executive Director shall appoint and remove the staff of the Council.
The Executive Director may contract for professional or consultant services.

text.section: The Executive Director may make agreements with local planning units in the region for temporary transfer or joint use of staff.
